title: Requires milk produced by cows fed, injected with or administered growth hormones to be so labeled
summary: Requires milk which is produced by cows which are fed, injected with or in any way administered growth hormones to be labeled "This milk was produced by cows administered growth hormones".
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring milk produced by cows fed, injected with or administered growth hormones to be labeled as such
